definition: earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

pinyin: Tu3 er3 qi2 xuan2 zhuan3 kao3 rou4

sentences.english: Bt the same time, there has been a "regrettable" slowing of reforms inside Turkey.
sentences.chinese: 同時土耳其內部鼎新也“使人缺憾地”放緩了。

sentences.english: She has journeyed on horseback through Africa and Turkey.
sentences.chinese: 她騎馬旅行，穿過了非洲和土耳其。

sentences.english: Its citizens will also be allowed to travel visa-free in Europe.
sentences.chinese: 土耳其公民也被允許免籤前往歐洲旅遊。

sentences.english: The government wants the European Union to permit visa-free travel for Turkish citizens.
sentences.chinese: 土耳其政府希望歐盟應當爲土耳其公民免除簽證。

sentences.english: The government wants the European Union to permit visa-free travel for Turkish citizens.
sentences.chinese: 土耳其政府希望歐盟應當爲土耳其公民免除簽證。

sentences.english: Its closest relatives are Turkish and Turkmen.
sentences.chinese: 與它最接近的是土耳其語和土庫曼語。

sentences.english: Dr Kengerli looks to Turkey as his mother country.
sentences.chinese: 肯戈理博士視土耳其爲自己的祖國。

sentences.english: Turkey, lying atop the North Anatolian fault, has been plagued by earthquakes frequently.
sentences.chinese: 土耳其位於位於北安納托利亞斷層上，經常遭受地震。

sentences.english: Cilicia is now part of the country of Turkey.
sentences.chinese: 西里西亞是今天土耳其的一部分。

sentences.english: But farther south Turkey is on virgin turf.
sentences.chinese: 而土耳其的南部偏遠地區卻是一片蠻荒之地。

sentences.english: Guti said he was considering an offer from Turkish club Besiktas.
sentences.chinese: 古蒂披露，他正在考慮來自土耳其貝西克塔斯的邀請。

sentences.english: Location. Titanic De Luxe Beach and Resort Hotel is located near Antalya, Turkey.
sentences.chinese: 泰坦尼克號海灘度假酒店臨近土耳其的安塔利亞。

sentences.english: Ruled at various times by Turkey and Austria, Banja Luka became part of Yugoslavia after World War I.
sentences.chinese: 不同時期曾先後由土耳其和奧地利統治。

sentences.english: Turkey Red Oil is derived from Castor Oil which has been treated to be fully dispersible in water.
sentences.chinese: 土耳其紅油是來自蓖麻油已治療得到充分分散在水中。

sentences.english: My father became one of Europe’s first Turkish guest workers.
sentences.chinese: 我的父親成了歐洲第一個土耳其外來工人。

sentences.english: It is not possible that Pires can go to any club in Turkey.
sentences.chinese: 皮雷斯不會去任何一家土耳其俱樂部。
